Summary: Sorting is not possible, in the women's shoes section, because when you click 'Sort' it is sorted randomly
Staps: 1. Open on website: https://mercurio.netlify.app/ 2. Click on 'Women' in the header 3. Click on 'Shop Now' button 4. Click on dropdown 'Sort: Price: high to low'
Expected result: Goods are sorted from high to low price
Actual result: Products are sorted randomly, hence the user will not see products from high to low price
